snippet: It was the first such move by China since Japan announced that it had bought a group of disputed islands in the East China Sea.

byline.contributor: Jane Perlez contributed reporting from Beijing.

lead_paragraph: It was the first such move by China since Japan announced that it had bought a group of disputed islands in the East China Sea.

headline.seo: Chinese Ships Enter Japanese-Controlled Waters to Protest Sale of Islands
headline.main: Chinese Ships Enter Japanese-Controlled Waters to Protest Sale of Islands
headline.print_headline: Chinese Ships Enter Japanese-Controlled Waters to Protest Sale of Islands
